section.name: Java Stored Procedures
section.p:
Java is a nearly ideal language for stored prcedures programming:
portable
based on open standards
safe
fast
developer-friendly

section.name: The problem
section.p: Though java bytecode is portable and java stored procedures can operate using standard APIs, until now there was no toolset for developers to really use java stored procedures.
J4SQL has tools that makes life really easy.
